title: The Natimuk Rock Climbers

abstract: 'You just rock up and climb'. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Horsham Shire'.
description: Louise Shepherd and Keith ‘Noddy’ Lockwood reminisce, tell anecdotes and reveal what makes a “mountain goat” tick, and how Mt Arapiles, in western Victoria, has shaped Natimuk’s destiny as an international destination for climbers.
